content: Yes, that's a great way to summarize the process! It's all about finding the right balance between the different vocal tracks and enhancing each one to make them sound like they belong together. The goal is to create a polished and cohesive sound that brings out the best in the vocals and highlights the strengths of each singer. Sound engineers have many tools at their disposal to achieve this, from EQ and compression to reverb and other effects, and it takes skill and experience to use them effectively. But when done right, the result can be a truly impressive and captivating sound.
